posts.text: Post 1: Today I felt motivated. I did some productive work and went for a walk.
adaptive_evidence: I felt motivated today and took positive actions.

posts.text: Post 2: Today I felt bad. I had a hard time getting out of bed and felt overwhelmed.
maladaptive_evidence: I felt bad and struggled with daily tasks.
